title: An Act prohibiting the sale of dextromethorphan to minors

abstracts.abstract: By Ms. Rausch, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1617) of Rebecca L. Rausch for legislation to prohibit the sale of dextromethorphan to minors.  Public Health.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Health
